fields.name: Elementary Operations
fields.description: Introduction to numbers and place value. Comparing single-digit and multi-digit numbers. Introduction to the four elementary operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, subtraction) and their long forms.

fields.name: Introduction to Shapes
fields.description: An introduction to the most common 2D and 3D shapes.

fields.name: Rational Numbers
fields.description: Non-natural numbers such as fractions, decimals, and negative numbers (i.e. all rational numbers) are introduced on the number line. How to add, subtract, multiply and divide these numbers.
